subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Chris Young, who won the American League Comeback Player of the Year Award last season, signed a one-year, $675,000 contract with Kansas City. He can make up to $5.325 million in incentive bonuses.
snippet: The right-hander Chris Young, who won the American League Comeback Player of the Year Award last season, signed a one-year, $675,000 contract with Kansas City. He can make up to $5.325 million in incentive bonuses.
